jusqu'à plus soif

  1. until one has quenched one's thirst, until one is not thirsty anymore
    boire jusqu'à plus soif ― to drink one's fill
  2. (figuratively) to one's heart's content, at will, as much as one wants, ad libitum
    Synonyms: à loisir, à volonté, tout son saoul
